game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, In-App Purchases, Steam Cloud, Stats, Steam Leaderboards, Remote Play on TV, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 유명한 세계관의 충돌이 차세대 대전 액션게임 Marvel vs. Capcom: Infinite로 돌아왔습니다. Ultron Sigma는 모든 생명체를 학살하기 시작했습니다. 모든 역경에도 불구하고, 영웅 들은 전능한 스톤에 맞서 싸워 최후의 위협에 대항합니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: The epic clash between two storied universes returns with Marvel vs. Capcom: Infinite. Ultron Sigma has begun the eradication of all biological life. Against all odds, heroes stand together against the ultimate threat, their only hope laying with the all-powerful Infinity Stones.

reviewHighlights.text: Looks ugly, BUT the free Marvel Vs Capcom Infinite Beyond mod makes this game worth it if you can get it on sale.
